metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Credit memo request items rejected
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Credit memo request items rejected") * 100

metrics.name: Unbilled items with billing block
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Unbilled items with billing block") * 100

metrics.name: Unbilled items incomplete for billing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Unbilled items incomplete for billing") * 100

metrics.name: Credit memo items manually created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Credit memo items manually created") * 100

metrics.name: Credit memo items canceled
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Credit memo items canceled") * 100

metrics.name: Credit memos not yet transferred to FI
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Credit memos not yet transferred to FI") * 100

metrics.name: Payment terms different in request and memo
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Payment terms different in request and memo") * 100

metrics.name: Payment terms different in credit memo and FI
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Payment terms different in credit memo and FI") * 100

metrics.name: FI document reversed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI document reversed") * 100

metrics.name: Credit memos manually released to FI
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Credit memos manually released to FI") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items manually cleared
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR items manually cleared") * 100

metrics.name: Credit memo items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Credit memo items created") * 100

metrics.name: Credit memo items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Credit memo items created")

metrics.name: FI-AR items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AR items created") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AR items created")

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AR items cleared") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AR items cleared")

metrics.name: Create credit memo request item with order-related billing according to order quantity
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo request item with order-related billing according to order quantity')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create credit memo request item with order-related billing according to target quantity
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo request item with order-related billing according to target quantity')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create credit memo request item with order-related billing according to delivery quantity
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo request item with order-related billing according to delivery quantity')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create credit memo request item via other means
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo request item via other means')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create credit memo manually via single transaction VF01
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo manually via single transaction VF01')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create credit memo via manual billing due processing
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo via manual billing due processing')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create credit memo automatically
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo automatically')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo via custom transaction')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo automatically from shipment')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create credit memo via other transactions
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create credit memo via other transactions')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post credit memo automatically to FI
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post credit memo automatically to FI')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post credit memo to FI after block
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post credit memo to FI after block')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post credit memo manually to FI after error resolution via VFX3
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post credit memo manually to FI after error resolution via VFX3')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post credit memo with other means
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post credit memo with other means')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear FI-AR item via payment run F110
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear FI-AR item via payment run F110')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear FI-AR item via account maintenance transaction FB1*
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear FI-AR item via account maintenance transaction FB1*')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear FI-AR item via manual payment
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear FI-AR item via manual payment')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear FI-AR item via transaction FB05
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear FI-AR item via transaction FB05')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear FI-AR item via reversal
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear FI-AR item via reversal')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear FI-AR item via other transactions
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear FI-AR item via other transactions')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
